headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: included_date
parameters.description: A certain date within the contract validity, or the start/end time of an ad group. Format: "2020-09-18".

parameters.name: rf_campaign_type
parameters.description: Use this field to specify whether you want to query TikTok Pulse contract. Enum values: STANDARD (Reach & Frequency), PULSE (TikTok Pulse). Note : This is an allowlist-only feature. If you would like to access it, please contact your TikTok representative.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Return code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Return messages. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: has_valid_contract
fields.description: Whether valid contracts can be found. Enum values: True , False . The correct contract start date and end date will be returned only when has_valid_contract = True , which means the specified included_date falls within the validity period of the Reach and Frequency contract or TikTok Pulse contract. If rf_campaign_type is not set as PULSE in the request, has_valid_contract is True when the specified included_date is a date within the Reach and Frequency contract validity period ( [start_date, end_date] ). If rf_campaign_type is set as PULSE in the request, has_valid_contract is True when the specified included_date is a date within the TikTok Pulse contract validity period ( [pulse_start_date, pulse_end_date] ).

fields.name: pulse_start_date
fields.description: Start date of TikTok Pulse contract. Returned when rf_campaign_type is set to PULSE in your request. Note : When you use /campaign/create/ to create an R&F campaign and set rf_campaign_type to PULSE , the schedule delivery time of your ad group ( [schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time] ) must fall on the intersection of [start_date, end_date] and [pulse_start_date, pulse_end_date] returned in this contract endpoint.

fields.name: pulse_end_date
fields.description: End date of TikTok Pulse contract. Returned when rf_campaign_type is set to PULSE in your request. Note : When you use /campaign/create/ to create an R&F campaign and set rf_campaign_type to PULSE , the schedule delivery time of your ad group ( [schedule_start_time, schedule_end_time] ) must fall on the intersection of [start_date, end_date] and [pulse_start_date, pulse_end_date] returned in this contract endpoint.

fields.name: start_date
fields.description: Start date of Reach and Frequency contract.

fields.name: end_date
fields.description: End date of Reach and Frequency contract.
